title: Taco Party Restaurant and Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Catering
description: Vegan taco truck and catering, opened this brick-and-mortar restaurant summer 2015. Serves tacos using plant proteins. Offers three main items: taco with seitan, tempeh or tofu plus rotating specials. Sides include Mexican brown rice and beans or chips and guacamole. As of Sept 2015 no Daiya cheese at this location. See webpage for truck's changing locations & times.
